# airthings-exporter

Prometheus exporter for Airthings devices.

## Requirements

- Python 3
- Airthings device
- Airthings API client

## Usage

```
pip3 install -r requirements.txt
python3 airthings-exporter.py --client-id [client_id] --client-secret [client_secret] --device-id [device_id]
```

## Device Support

- Airthings View Plus
